19875817.promotionName: BEAUTY: FREE SHIPPING no threshold - updated
19875817.description: Free shipping with any beauty purchase.
19875817.legalDisclaimer: TO GET FREE SHIPPING WITH ANY BEAUTY PURCHASE: Place qualifying items in shopping bag. No promo code needed. Offer applies to Standard Shipping to one location and may be applied to Premium or Overnight Shipping for an upgrade fee. Free Shipping does not apply to furniture, mattress, purchases in Macys stores, prior purchases or international orders. A $10 shipping surcharge on domestic orders applies to customers living outside the contiguous United States: Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, Guam, American Samoa, Micronesia, Marshall Islands, North Mariana Islands, Palau and U.S. Virgin Islands. Due to size and/or weight, certain items bear a shipping surcharge, which will still apply. TO GET FREE RETURNS: You can return merchandise by mail or in store for a full refund, which will be credited on your original tender. Free Returns exclude gift cards, food, gourmet gifts, lamps, wall art, mirrors, furniture, mattresses & area rugs. Does not apply to international orders. Gift returns or orders with different shipping & billing informationor if you paid with a Gift Cardare refunded on an Easy Exchange Card, which you can use for future online or in-store purchases.

19879231.promotionName: BEAUTY: BADGE TEXT ONLY free ship & returns 12/21
19879231.description: Enjoy Free Shipping & Free Returns with your beauty purchase.
19879231.offerDescription: Free Shipping & Returns with any Beauty Purchase
